org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class EventProvider<T extends NativeObjectContainer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.EventProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - options element to store chart configuration
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, AddHandlerEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animation, ConfigurationOptions, Legend

    public abstract class EventProvider<T extends NativeObjectContainer>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddHandlerEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    Is a JavaScript object container, which contains the chart instance and options element to store chart configuration, which will manage chart events to events handlers.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Merge a native object into this one with a specific property name.
      This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration into options of chart.

        public final void merge(NativeObjectContainer source,
